mapper.sql: ID, ITEM_ID, PAY_TYPE, UNIT_TYPE, COST, UNIT, IS_SHOW, LEVEL, FINISH_PAY_TYPE, FINISH_COST
mapper.select:
select count(*) from PAYMENT where 1=1
and ( ID like '${searchValue}%' or ITEM_ID like '${searchValue}%' )
mapper.insert: insert into PAYMENT (ID, ITEM_ID, PAY_TYPE, UNIT_TYPE, COST, UNIT, IS_SHOW, LEVEL, FINISH_PAY_TYPE, FINISH_COST) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{itemId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{payType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{unitType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cost,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{unit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isShow,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{finishPayType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{finishCost,jdbcType=INTEGER})

replace into PAYMENT (ID, ITEM_ID, PAY_TYPE, UNIT_TYPE, COST, UNIT, IS_SHOW, LEVEL, FINISH_PAY_TYPE, FINISH_COST) values
(#{item.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.itemId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.payType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.unitType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.cost,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.unit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.isShow,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.finishPayType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.finishCost,jdbcType=INTEGER})

SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
insert into PAYMENT
ID,
ITEM_ID,
PAY_TYPE,
UNIT_TYPE,
COST,
UNIT,
IS_SHOW,
LEVEL,
FINISH_PAY_TYPE,
FINISH_COST,

mapper.update:
update PAYMENT
ITEM_ID = #{itemId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PAY_TYPE = #{payType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
UNIT_TYPE = #{unitType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
COST = #{cost,jdbcType=INTEGER},
UNIT = #{unit,jdbcType=INTEGER},
IS_SHOW = #{isShow,jdbcType=TINYINT},
LEVEL = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER},
FINISH_PAY_TYPE = #{finishPayType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
FINISH_COST = #{finishCost,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update PAYMENT set ITEM_ID = #{itemId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PAY_TYPE = #{payType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, UNIT_TYPE = #{unitType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, COST = #{cost,jdbcType=INTEGER}, UNIT = #{unit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, IS_SHOW = #{isShow,jdbcType=TINYINT}, LEVEL = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, FINISH_PAY_TYPE = #{finishPayType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, FINISH_COST = #{finishCost,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
